effect.diamond_pearl: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.

effect.heartgold_soulsilver: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing the foe from landing critical hits.
